field.name: description
field.value:
line checks for nullness of abstractExecutor.Property.Name rather than abstractExecutor.Property
throws nullref if using .Method
patch attached, but it's crazy simple to fix.

comment.author: mattyr
jonorossi
comment.text: Thanks Matthew, a small unit test to ensure this defect doesn't come back would be great if you get a chance.
